amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer or enforce the Trump administration's short-term, limited duration insurance rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer or enforce the Trump administration's short-term, limited duration insurance rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 188 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 188 (Roll no. 283).
